actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to provide that the Federal Trade Commission shall not have any authority to investigate or regulate the health professions.

summary.text: States that the Federal Trade Commission shall not have any authority to investigate or regulate health professionals or any association of health professionals. Provides that the antitrust authority of the Attorney General shall remain unaffected.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Federal Trade Commission shall not have any authority to investigate or regulate the health professions.
